comment: Pirelli bot out by Beijing based Sinochem. Pirelli is about as Italian as Peking Duck!
amr:
# ::snt Pirelli bot out by Beijing based Sinochem. Pirelli is about as Italian as Peking Duck!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / bot-out-01
            :ARG0 (c / company
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Sinochem")
                  :ARG1-of (b2 / base-01
                        :location (c2 / city
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Beijing"))))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Pirelli")))
      :snt2 (h / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 p
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Italy")))
            :ARG3 (e / equal)
            :ARG4 (p3 / person
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Peking"
                        :op2 "Duck"))))

comment: who wants calendars of tires - I will stick to my calendar of green hilsides of America thank you
amr:
# ::snt who wants calendars of tires - I will stick to my calendar of green hilsides of America thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (c / calendar
                  :consist-of (t / tire)))
      :snt2 (s / stick-01
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (c2 / calendar
                  :poss ii
                  :consist-of (h / hilsides
                        :ARG1-of (g / green-02)
                        :mod (c3 / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "America"))))
            :ARG2-of (t2 / thank-01
                  :ARG1 (y / you))))
